title: Fees
context: ยง582-5 Fees. Any judge of the State who appoints counsel or guardian ad litem pursuant to the compact may, in the judge&rsquo;s discretion, fix a fee to be paid out of funds available for disposition by the court but no such fee shall exceed the sum of $75.
